quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
If you always do what you’ve always done, you’ll always get what you’ve always got.
Most problems resolve themselves. Just do not disturb them!
The biggest enemy of quality is the hurry.
You cannot overtake anyone if you follow in his footsteps.
Remember that there is only one important time and it is Now.
The trouble with anger is that you harm yourself without benefiting others.
Patience and humor are two camels that can take you through any desert.
It’s Not What We Teach; It’s What They Learn
Writing is easy. All you have to do is cross out the wrong words.
